QuestData.Title: Catch the Caravan
QuestData.Description:
You should catch up with Brena. Her caravan passed through no more than a few hours ago.
They were collecting our late chieftain's most prized possessions for a funeral to honor him.
Given that the caravan was heavily burdened, she can't be far ahead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Catch up with Brena near the Big Tree Hills.
QuestData.RewardText:
The gnolls were ruthless in their assault.
They hit us hard and fast and took everything that wasn't nailed down.
